column3: kora mo do: na wo mu na muguan bɛhyɛ."

column4: Minnyi biribi papa bi kyɛn ɔwo."

column2: "Na ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ asaase do no dze
column3: Hɔn nye enyimnyamfo a m’enyigye nyinara wɔ hɔn mu."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔdze EWURADZE sesa nyame fofor no
column3: wɔma hɔn awerɛhow dɔɔ so: Meremmfa hɔn bɔgyaa huensa no nnkrantse
column4: Eso meremmfa m’ano mmbɔ hɔn enyame dzin."
na mo kɔɔpow: Ɔwo na ema me kyɛpɛn ko hɔ."

column2: "Esusuhoma no egu me wɔ mbrɛ oye; Nyew
"Mibehyira EWURADZE a ɔama me apam no: Nyew
column3: m’akoma tu me fo anadwe ber."

column2: "Medze EWURADZE esi m’enyim daa: Ɔnam dɛ ɔwɔ m’enyimfa ntsi

column3: na m’enyimnyam dzi ehurusi: Mo honam so bɛtsena hɔ sɔkyee."

column2: "Na ɔwo renndan me kra nngya samanadze; Nkyii so eremma kwan ma wo krɔnkrɔnnyi nnhu mprɔwee."
"Ɔwo na ebɛkyerɛ me nkwa kwan: Ahotɔ a ɔmee wɔ w’enyim; Enyigye wɔ w’abanyimfa hɔ daa."
